Available as a bare tool or in kit form.

name: Ingersoll Rand 3107G 1/4-Inch Straight Air Die Grinder with Ergonomic Grip
short_description: RELIABLE ANGLE GRINDER: The 3107G Air Die Grinder features a powerful 1/3 hp motor and a 1/4-inch collet. Powered by compressed air, this air tool has a rear exhaust and a self-locking throttle. It delivers 27,000 rpm to tackle even the most challenging jobs with ease.

CONVENIENT AIR GRINDER: This air-compressor grinding tool is equipped with a contoured grip for enhanced comfort and control during operation, ensuring precise torque and increased productivity while grinding, cutting, polishing, and more.

HEAVY-DUTY CONSTRUCTION: The 3107G boasts a ball-bearing construction that ensures exceptional durability. This compact, lightweight tool weighs only 1 lb. Each component has undergone rigorous testing to ensure long-lasting performance.

IMPRESSIVE FEATURES: Experience unmatched reliability and efficiency with the Ingersoll Rand 3107G Air Die Grinder. Its exceptional torque precision and its lightweight and sturdy construction make it the ideal choice for professionals and DIY enthusiasts.
UNLOCK YOUR POTENTIAL: For 160 years, Ingersoll Rand has been committed to making life better by creating innovative, durable, and quality tools. Our legacy is reflected in every product we make.
product_description: Experience the ultimate performance and versatility with the Ingersoll Rand 3107G Air Die Grinder. Powered by compressed air and driven by a robust 1/3 hp motor, this air grinder is engineered to power through difficult jobs with ease. Equipped with a 1/4-inch collet, rear exhaust, and a self-locking throttle, it delivers an impressive 27,000 rpm, making it the ideal tool for grinding, cutting, polishing, and more. Its contoured grip ensures greater comfort and control, and its ergonomic design enhances torque precision, productivity, and safety. Crafted for durability and reliability, the 3107G is light and sturdy and weighs only 1 lb. Its ball-bearing construction ensures exceptional ruggedness, and its compact design makes it easy to handle and maneuver, even in tight spaces. Whether you’re a professional tradesperson or a DIY enthusiast, this air grinder is the perfect handheld power rotary tool for various applications. Each component, mechanism, and function has undergone rigorous testing to offer long-lasting performance, ensuring that this tool will withstand the demands of your toughest tasks. Ingersoll Rand is a trusted name in industrial innovation and excellence. With a rich legacy spanning over a century, Ingersoll Rand has continuously pushed the boundaries of engineering to deliver cutting-edge solutions that power progress across industries worldwide.

name: Chicago Pneumatic CP7408 - Air Die Grinder Tool, Welder, Woodworking, Automotive Car Detailing, Stainless Steel Polisher, Heavy Duty, Right Angle Grinder, 1/4 Inch (6 mm), 0.34 HP / 250 W - 23000 RPM
short_description: Powerful and Fast: The CP7408 Air Angle Die Grinder is equipped with a 0.34 horsepower motor that delivers a maximum speed of 23,000 RPM, making it ideal for heavy-duty grinding and polishing tasks.

Ergonomic Design: The CP7408 Air Angle Die Grinder features a compact and lightweight design that ensures extreme maneuverability in tight spaces. Its surface grip and composite housing provide comfort day-to-day to the operator.

Safe to Use: The CP7408 Air Angle Die Grinder comes with a lock-off throttle that prevents accidental start-ups, ensuring maximum safety for the user. Its robust aluminum alloy body is built to withstand heavy usage and provides long-lasting durability.

Versatile Applications: The CP7408 Air Angle Die Grinder is designed for body shop and MRO applications. It is ideal for use in welding, woodworking, automotive detailing, stainless steel polishing, and heavy-duty grinding applications.

General Specifications: The CP7408 Air Angle Die Grinder features a 1/4-inch collet chuck that can be used with various burrs for polishing and grinding. It has a length of 7.68 inches, a width of 1.5 inches, a height of 3.6inches, and requires an air pressure of 90 PSI to operate.
product_description: Chicago Pneumatic has introduced a new range of ¼” and 6 mm pneumatic die grinders to its portfolio. The new CP74 Series has been designed to optimize productivity and operator comfort. Delivering up to 20% more power than the CP91 range and with a collet design for quick and easy burr changes, the CP74 pneumatic die grinders can help optimize productivity in metal fabrication applications, as well as vehicle servicing and repair. Spindle lock system: The CP74 Series of ¼” and 6 mm pneumatic die grinders are equipped with a novel locking spindle system that makes changing the carbide burrs quicker and easier than standard die grinders needing two spanner wrenches. By removing the use of one spanner wrench operators no longer have to place the tool in a vice or between their knees, reducing production stoppage times and improving productivity. High application coverage: CP74 die grinders further contribute to operational efficiency by offering a choice of six different heads — short or long, straight or angle (120°, 90°) — to offer the best possible configuration for the application such as matching welded surface, deburring, and chamfering, etc. High comfort provided: User comfort is another key attraction of the CP74 Series. The grinder’s handles are made from thermoplastic rubber (TPR) which ensures that the operator can maintain a good surface grip. In addition, the rugged composite casing on the CP74 die grinders acts as an insulator, reducing heat transfer between the motor and the sleeve. In combination, these features ensure that the operator can work comfortably for longer. Excellent power-to-weight performance: CP74 pneumatic die grinders operate between 22,000 and 28,000 rpm depending on the model. With the smallest grinder in the series weighing just 1.1 lb. (0.5 kg) and the largest grinder 2.43 lb. (1.1 kg), these tools offer excellent power-to-weight performance. Since its foundation in the United States in 1901, Chicago Pneumatic has established itself as the leader in the industry, offering best-in-class pneumatic tools. At Chicago Pneumatic, our people start the day, every day, with the drive to research, develop, manufacture and deliver the products that meet your needs, today and tomorrow..

name: 1/4'' | 1/8'' Extended Air Die Grinder Pneumatic Grinding Tool
short_description: 【PRODUCT SIZE】Includes Extended Die Grinder and 2 Wrenches; Collet Size: 1/4" (6mm) and 1/8" (3mm); Air Consumption: 3.5 CFM @ 90 PSI; Free Speed: 22,000 RPM; Air Inlet Thread Size: 1/4 Inch NPT; Length: 11 Inches.
【PNEUMATIC DIE GRINDER】air grinder air tool features an extra 6 inch extended reach for working in tight, confined spaces that regular-sized surface grinders cannot reach.

【CONVENIENT FEATURES】Extension air die grinder features long service life, high speed, low noise, low air consumption, and easy operation; Rear exhaust on this die grinder surface prep tool can direct airflow from work surfaces.

【COMFORTABLE DESIGN】This extended cut off tool comes with an ergonomic handle for effortless use, alleviating hand fatigue and wrist strain; Compact die grinder makes it comfortable to work in hard-to-reach areas with its extended reach.

【WIDE APPLICATION】This long neck die grinder is suitable for grinding wood, furniture, sculptures, metal, and stone with different grinding bits; Ideal air powered die grinder for removing solder joints and rust spots on metal products.
